choices.name: BAA_Automatic_Debit
choices.choiceText: Automatic debit (ACH) from my bank account (complete the bank information below)

choices.name: BAA_BackupWithholding
choices.choiceText: I have been notified by the IRS that I am currently subject to backup withholding because I failed to report all interest and dividends on my tax return.

choices.name: BAA_NoBackupWithholding
choices.choiceText: I am not subject to backup withholding because I am exempt from backup withholding, or I have not been notified by the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) that I am subject to backup withholding as a result of a failure to report all interest or dividends, or the IRS has notified me that I am no longer subject to backup withholding.

choices.name: BAA_OneTimeDebit
choices.choiceText: one-time debit (ACH) from my bank account (complete the bank information below)

choices.name: BAA_Payroll_Deduction
choices.choiceText: payroll deduction from my employer (unless made by employer check, complete Employer Authorization Agreement for One-Time Debit (ACH))

choices.name: Check
choices.choiceText: check (including checks sent by or through your bank)

choices.name: X15thOfMonth
choices.choiceText: 15th Of Month

choices.name: X1stOfMonth
choices.choiceText: 1st Of Month

formulas.name: ResourceBookLink
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL({!CurrentEnrollmentForm.Type__c},'Traditional IRA'), 'https://pensionfund.org/uploads/Traditional-IRA-Owner-Resource-Book.pdf', IF( ISPICKVAL({!CurrentEnrollmentForm.Type__c}, 'Roth IRA'), 'https://pensionfund.org/uploads/Roth-IRA-Owner-Resource-Book.pdf', IF( ISPICKVAL({!CurrentEnrollmentForm.Type__c}, 'Benefit Accumulation Account'), 'https://pensionfund.org/uploads/BAA-Account-Holder-Resource-Book.pdf', '' ) ) )

Flow.label: Self Enrollment Flow Final w/Continue Enrollment

fields.name: Error_message_1
fields.fieldText: You must currently be a U.S. Resident to be eligible to enroll in this product.﻿

fields.name: Display
fields.fieldText: Selected form type ({!SelectedFormType}) is not supported at the moment.

fields.name: Please_choose_product
fields.fieldText: Please choose a product you want to enroll in:

textTemplates.description: The full name of the account type
textTemplates.name: BAA_Account
BAA_Certification_Text
textTemplates.text:
• I agree to be bound by all terms of the BAA, as it may be amended from time to time, and all administrative policies and procedures adopted by Pension Fund with respect to the BAA.
  • I understand that I can access the BAA Plan and Account Holder Resource Book and other information regarding the BAA electronically at www.pensionfund.org, and that I can also request Pension Fund mail me a copy of the BAA Plan and Account Holder Resource Book.
  • I certify that the information provided on this BAA Enrollment Form is accurate, including my Social Security Number/ITIN. I agree that I will timely notify Pension Fund of any changes to the information provided on this Form.
  • I understand that the interest I earn on my BAA is taxable the year in which earned. I understand that I am responsible for the tax consequences of any contributions or distributions.
  • If applicable, I hereby authorize my bank to debit the bank account identified above and authorize Pension Fund to accept these deposits. These debits and deposits are to be made under the Rules of the Automated Clearing House (ACH). If I have elected recurring contributions, I understand that this Agreement will remain in effect until I give written notice of termination to Pension Fund.
  • I understand that Pension Fund and the BAA are exempt from the registration, regulation, and reporting requirements of the Securities Act of 1933, the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the Investment Company Act of 1940, and state securities laws. Benefit Accumulation Account holders are not afforded the protection of those laws with respect to their interest in the BAA.

textTemplates.name: BAADescription
textTemplates.text:
In order to open a Benefit Accumulation Account (BAA), you must be a U.S. resident who is:

  • a member of the Pension Plan of Pension Fund of the Christian Church ("Pension Plan") or the Tax-Deferred Retirement Account of Pension Fund of the Christian Church ("TDRA");
  • an owner of a Traditional IRA or Roth IRA under the Defined Contribution Retirement Accounts of Pension Fund of the Christian Church ;
  • a spouse of a member or IRA owner; or
  • a surviving spouse who is the member's beneficiary under the Pension Plan or TDRA.

textTemplates.name: BAAHeader
textTemplates.text: {!BAA_Account}

textTemplates.name: IRA_Certification_Text
textTemplates.text:
• I agree to be bound by all terms of the IRA, as it may be amended from time to time, and all administrative policies and procedures adopted by Pension Fund with respect to the IRA.
  • I understand that I can access the {!CurrentEnrollmentForm.Type__c} Owner Resource Book and other information regarding IRAs electronically at www.pensionfund.org, and that I can also request Pension Fund mail me a copy of the {!CurrentEnrollmentForm.Type__c} Owner Resource Book.
  • I certify that I have received, reviewed and understand the IRA Disclosure Statement and IRA Financial Disclosure. I understand that I have seven days from the date that Pension Fund receives this enrollment to revoke it without penalty by mailing or delivering a written notice to Pension Fund.
  • I certify that I am an employee or employee of an employer that is eligible to participate in the IRA, or the spouse of such eligible employee or former employee.
  • I certify that the information provided on this IRA Enrollment Form is accurate, including my Social Security Number/ITIN. I agree that I will timely notify Pension Fund of any changes to the information.
  • I assume complete responsibility for ensuring that all contributions I make are within the limits set forth by the tax laws and for the tax consequences of any contribution and distributions. I understand that I am responsible for determining and tracking the cost basis in the IRA.
  • If applicable, I hereby authorize my bank to debit the bank account identified and authorize Pension Fund to accept these deposits. These debits and deposits are to be made under the Rules of the Automated Clearing House (ACH). If I have elected recurring contributions, I understand that this Agreement will remain in effect until I give written notice of termination to Pension Fund.
  • I understand that Pension Fund and the IRA are exempt from the registration, regulation, and reporting requirements of the Securities Act of 1933, the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the Investment Company Act of 1940, and state securities laws. Participants and beneficiaries are not afforded the protection of those laws with respect to their interest in the IRA.

textTemplates.name: PensionPlanText
textTemplates.text: If you are ordained/commissioned and want to self-pay your Pension Plan dues, please contact your Area Director regarding your Pension Plan enrollment.

textTemplates.name: PP_Certification_Text
textTemplates.text:
• I agree to be bound by all terms of the Pension Plan, as it may be amended from time to time, and all administrative policies and procedures adopted by Pension Fund with respect to the Pension Plan.
  • I understand that I can access the Pension Plan Member Resource Book and other information regarding the Pension Plan electronically at www.pensionfund.org, and that I can also request Pension Fund mail me a copy of the Pension Plan Member Resource Book.
  • I certify that the information provided is accurate, including my Social Security Number/ITIN. I agree that I will timely notify Pension Fund of any changes to the information provided, including changes to the amount or type of dues, to my marital status, and to the status of my children and parents. I understand that failure to provide accurate and timely information may result in a reduction of my benefits.
  • I understand that if my employer’s Participation Agreement permits members to each elect a different percentage of employee dues on a pre-tax basis, and I choose to change my elections reflected on this Enrollment Form or on a separate salary contribution agreement with my employer, I must complete and submit a Salary Contribution Agreement to my Employer which reflects that change before the effective date of the change.
  • I understand that Pension Fund and the Pension Plan are exempt from the registration, regulation, and reporting requirements of the Securities Act of 1933, the Securities Exchange Act of 1945, the Investment Company Act of 1940, and state securities laws. Participants and beneficiaries are not afforded the protection of those laws with respect to their interest in the Pension Plan.
  • I will provide Pension Fund with the following documents to complete my application, as applicable:
    • Copy of my birth certificate
    • Copy of current ministerial credentials, if I am a minister
    • Beneficiary Designation Form
    • Copy of my marriage certificate/proof of marriage, if I am married

textTemplates.name: RothIRADescritption
textTemplates.text:
Complete this Roth IRA Enrollment Form in order to open an account ("RI account") under the Roth IRA ("BAA").
to be continued...

textTemplates.description: This text templates is used on the 'Personal Information' gathering page of the Roth IRA Enrollment Form
textTemplates.name: RothIRAHeader
TDRA_Certification_Text
textTemplates.text:
• I agree to be bound by all terms of the TDRA 403(b)/Roth 403(b) , as it may be amended from time to time, and all administrative policies and procedures adopted by Pension Fund with respect to the TDRA 403(b)/Roth 403(b).
  • I understand that I can access the TDRA 403(b)/Roth 403(b) Member Resource Book and other information regarding the TDRA electronically at www.pensionfund.org, and that I can also request Pension Fund mail me a copy of the TDRA 403(b)/Roth 403(b) Member Resource Book.
  • I certify that the information provided on this TDRA 403(b)/Roth 403(b) Enrollment Form is accurate, including my Social Security Number/ITIN. I agree that I will timely notify Pension Fund of any changes to the information provided.
  • I understand that the contribution elections that I have made for this enrollment will continue to be in effect from year to year unless I change or terminate them. I understand that I may prospectively change my elections at any time by completing and submitting a Salary Contribution Agreement to my employer which reflects that change. I further understand that I may terminate my elections at any time by notifying my employer in writing.
  • If I am a minister, I will submit a copy of my current ministerial credentials.
  • I understand that Pension Fund and the TDRA 403(b)/Roth 403(b)are exempt from the registration, regulation, and reporting requirements of the Securities Act of 1933, the Securities Exchange Act of 1945, the Investment Company Act of 1940, and state securities laws. Participants and beneficiaries are not afforded the protection of those laws with respect to their interest in the TDRA 403(b)/Roth 403(b).

textTemplates.name: TDRADescription
textTemplates.text:
Complete this TDRA Enrollment Form to begin participation in the Tax-Deferred Retirement Account of the Pension Fund of the Christian Church (Disciples of Christ) ("TDRA").
As a member, the following types of contributions may be made to the TDRA on your behalf:
  • Employee salary reduction contributions, if permitted under your employer's Participation Agreement.Complete Section II to elect salary reduction contributions. Your employer will receive a copy of this Form to reflect the salary contribution agreement between you and your employer.
  • Employer contributions, if permitted under your employer's Participation Agreement.
  • Rollover contributionsfrom an IRA or eligible retirement plan.Complete and return Application for Rollover Contribution to TDRA.
  • Contract exchange/plan-to-plan transferfrom another contract/account under your employer's 403(b) plan.Complete and return Application for Contract Exchange/Plan-to-Plan Transfer to TDRA.

textTemplates.name: TDRAHeader
textTemplates.text: {!TDRA_Account}

textTemplates.name: TraditionalIRADescription
textTemplates.text:
Complete this Traditional IRA Enrollment Form in order to open an account ("RI account") under the Traditional IRA ("BAA").
to be continued...
